Fortuna's documentation /API References /Utils

Utils¶

The probabilistic model automatically handles random number generator updates via a random number generator object. Please find its reference below.

class fortuna.utils.random.RandomNumberGenerator(seed)[source]¶

A random number generator object.

Parameters:

seed (int) – A random seed.

get()[source]¶

Get the internal random number generator key. Whenever this function is called, the random number generator key is updated.

Returns:

A random number generator key.

Return type:

PRNGKeyArray
